lead_paragraph: Rutgers point guard Matee Ajavon had an operation to repair a stress fracture of the left tibia and is expected to miss the start of the season, Coach C. Vivian Stringer said yesterday. Last season, as a sophomore, Ajavon averaged 12.6 points, 4.5 assists and 2.6 steals a game and was selected to the first team All-Big East.
